feed.title: Google Cloud: Google Cloud Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Google Cloud Architecture Center

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: (New guide) [Secure apps and resources by using context-aware access](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/secure-apps-resources-using-context-aware-access): Describes how you can use context-aware access to secure different types of apps and resources.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: (New guide) [Best practices for securing apps and resources by using context-aware access](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/secure-apps-resources-using-context-aware-access/best-practices): Describes best practices for using context-aware access to secure apps and resources.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: (New guide) [GraphRAG infrastructure for generative AI using Vertex AI and Spanner Graph](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/gen-ai-graphrag-spanner): Shows how to design infrastructure for GraphRAG-capable generative AI applications in Google Cloud by using Vertex AI and Spanner Graph.

entry.title: Feature
entry.content: (New guide) [Optimize AI and ML workloads with Google Cloud Managed Lustre](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/optimize-ai-ml-workloads-managed-lustre): Shows how to use Managed Lustre to optimize the performance of AI and ML workloads.

entry.title: Changed
entry.content: [Patterns for connecting other cloud service providers with Google Cloud](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/patterns-for-connecting-other-csps-with-gcp): Added Network Connectivity Center and Hybrid NAT where relevant. Updated VPN references to only refer to HA VPN.

entry.title: Changed
entry.content: [AI and ML perspective: Cost optimization](https://cloud.google.com/architecture/framework/perspectives/ai-ml/cost-optimization): Major update to expand the cost optimization recommendations in the AI and ML perspective.
